description: Detects commands used by Turla group as reported by ESET in May 2020 Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Turla Group Commands May 2020
query: (process.command_line:(*tracert\ \-h\ 10\ yahoo.com* OR *.WSqmCons\)\)|iex;* OR *Fr`omBa`se6`4Str`ing*) OR (process.command_line:*net\ use\ https\:\/\/docs.live.net* AND process.command_line:*@aol.co.uk*))
